mapper.select: select p.*, t.role_id from permission p LEFT JOIN (select rp.* from role_permission rp where rp.role_id=${roleId}) t on p.id = t.permission_id where (p.category = 'admin' or p.parent_id = 0) order by p.parent_id

select p.* from permission p JOIN (select DISTINCT rp.permission_id from role_permission rp where rp.role_id in(select role_id from user_role ur where ur.user_id=${userId})) t on p.id = t.permission_id and (p.category = 'admin' or p.parent_id = 0)
